title: A Love for Three Lives：Monster King Don’t Forget Me - Novel Updates
tags: Fallen Nobility   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Strategic Battles
author: Tang Hua Mo Ge   唐婳墨歌
description:
Ronghua, the princess of the gods and the heir of God Empress, is born with the vigor of a monarch. She is supposed to stand on the zenith of superiors and look at all creatures beneath her, but all her clansmen get murdered all of a sudden, and she also falls from the cloud to the dirt. Weilian, the King of Death, risks his life to save her, but she believes that he betrays her. What will they do if the crisis of confidence happens? 

He hurts her so much, but she loves him more. It sounds ridiculous, but it is true! The princess wants a new life. However, it may be their fate to meet each other though it seems like a mistake. Will the princess forget Weilian? What is waiting for the lovebirds? Is it a happy ending? 
>
